lowering.sparqlQuery: PREFIX a: <http://sadiframework.org/examples/regression.owl#> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> SELECT ?x ?y ?inputNodeURI WHERE { ?inputNodeURI rdf:type a:PairedValueCollection . ?inputNodeURI a:element ?element . ?element rdf:type a:PairedValue . ?element a:x ?x . ?element a:y ?y . }
